=============================

.. summary-start

Enrich the information coming from MetaNetX from additional sources.

Usage
=====

Please use the command line program help to explore use-cases.

.. code-block:: console

    mnx-post --help

Install
=======

It's as simple as:

.. code-block:: console

    pip install metanetx-post
